keepConnect.name: Stay connected
keepConnect.helperText: If you click on the Start link, then keep the link. This requires attention that the link will be reconnected continuously after it is disconnected.

url.name: URL
url.helperText: Link URL, for example ws://192.168.0.2:7001, or wws://example.com/path
url.error: The correct URL is a URL starting with ws:// or wws://
